text-fqa-14: Please contact Amazon support, by clicking on the ‘?’ (upper right), scroll down at the end of the help page and request support.
Olist-driverpickupdo-29: Click on the notification and scan the parcels. You need to scan the expired parcels within 2 hours after the notification appears.Now wait until a driver arrives (usually 1-2 days).
Olist-driverdeliverydo-8: You can see the scanned parcel below the camera. Check if all parcels are scanned. If you have done so the task will automatically end by showing ‘Done’. If you have read this, please click on “small box”.
Olist-driverpickupdo-30: If a driver arrives, select “Driver pickup” from the home screen. Find the parcels named on the list and hand them to the driver.
title-4-whatiscounter-1: What is the Amazon Counter Service?
bluetext-2: What if the carrier is attempting to deliver a parcel that appears damaged?
text-fqa-15: Parcels will expire after 14 days, please allow a couple days for  the driver to pick up. Please contact Amazon support, by clicking on the ‘?’ (upper right), scroll down at the end of the help page if a parcel is not picked up within 3 days
text-fqa-8: If possible, do not scan in the damaged parcel and reject it by giving it back to the driver. The driver will return the parcel to the depot and the customer will receive a refund.
title-4-customerpickupdo-5: What do I do? Please test the following steps on the Amazon app below:
text-fqa-9: No, customers only need to present their pickup code to collect their parcels.
Olist-driverdeliverydo-6: Select “Driver delivery” from the home screen.
text-fqa-10: If the customer cannot find their pickup notification offer the following tips: Check email: The pickup code will be in an email from “Delivery notifications”. Get support: Have the customer reach out to customer service by selecting Contact Us on the Amazon website or Amazon mobile app. An Amazon customer service representative can resend the pickup code when the customer can verify their account.
bluetext-6: What if the app isn’t working?
Olist-inventory-41: If you click on ‘Inventory’, you can see the current amount of packages in your store
Olist-driverdeliverybusy-10: Delivered parcels must be scanned in within 30 minutes.
Olist-customerpickupdo-18: Retrieve the available parcels for the customer as shown in the list and select “Scan parcels”. Click on “Scan parcels”.
Olist-customerpickupdo-17: Scan the customer pickup barcode. If you have read this, click on the scan frame to proceed.
Olist-customerpickupdo-19: Scan all of the parcels by placing each parcel label in the frame. Click on the scan frame again.
bluetext-9: What if I have expired parcels waiting for the carrier to pick up, but the customer arrives to pickup the parcel?
text-fqa-7: Please contact Amazon support, by clicking on the ‘?’ (upper right), scroll down at the end of the help page and request support.
bluetext-1: I forgot my username and password, what do I do?
text-parcelinventory-6: Inventory refers to the parcels that are in delivery to your store or have been delivered to your store already, but have yet to be picked up by Amazon customers or a delivery driver for parcels that were never picked up within the specified period of time. Parcels in inventory should be stored in a safe and secure area out of sight and reach of customers. Closets, cabinets, and drawers with close proximity to where customers pay are optimal places to house the parcel inventory.
Olist-customerpickupscanissues-22: Click on the size description of the parcel (e.g. “small size”)
Olist-inventory-40: Click on the icon on the top left on the menu.
Olist-support-38: If you did not find adequate support yet, you can request a service call.
Olist-customerpickupscanissues-20: Select “Customer pickup” in the home screen.
title-4-driverdeliverybusy-3: What if I am busy? Please test the following steps on the Amazon app below:
Olist-driverdeliverybusy-12: Once the 30 minute timer expires, you must scan parcels immediately. Until the parcels are scanned, you will not be able to access other Amazon Hub Counter workflows.
text-driverpickup-4: If customers do not pickup their parcel within 14 days, the parcel expires. Then you need to request driver pickup. A delivery driver will arrive at the retail store location to pick up parcels.
Olist-customerpickupmissing-27: You can choose to “unable to find” or “reject”.
bluetext-7: What if I run out of space for parcels?
text-title-1: Your location provides a service from Amazon that allows customers to ship orders to your location and pick them up. Here you'll learn how to use the App and how to get support.
Olist-driverdeliveryscanissue-14: Click on the icon resembling a keypad.
text-fqa-12: Please contact Amazon support, by clicking on the ‘?’ (upper right), scroll down at the end of the help page and request support.
Olist-support-35: If you click on ‘?’ Amazon help is provided
Olist-driverdeliveryscanissue-15: The tracking ID usually starts with QC and contains 12 digits in total.
Olist-customerpickupdo-20: Now hand all the parcels to the customer.
text-fqa-13: Please contact Amazon support, by clicking on the ‘?’ (upper right), scroll down at the end of the help page and request support.
Olist-driverdeliverydo-9: Store parcels in a secure and organized place to ensure easy retrieval when the customer arrives.
Olist-customerpickupmissing-25: If the scan frame appears, do NOT scan the parcel.
title-4-customerpickupdo-6: What if I have scan issues?
text-driverdelivery-2: A driver will arrive at your store to deliver parcels for Amazon customers who choose you as pickup location. When the driver hands you the parcel, you need to scan each parcel label. This will send a customer notification that the parcel is ready for pickup. The customer has 14 days to pickup the parcel.
title-4-driverdeliverydo-2: What do I do? Please test the following steps on the Amazon app below:
title-4-driverpickupdo-8: What do I do? Please test the following steps on the Amazon app below:
Olist-driverpickupdo-28: If parcels expire, a notification will appear on the main screen.
bluetext-5: What if the device is lost, stolen or broken?
title-4-customerpickupmissing-7: What if the parcel is missing or the customer does not want the parcel?
Olist-driverdeliverydo-7: Scan all parcels by placing each parcel label in the scan frame. Test it by clicking on the scan frame below.
Olist-driverdeliverybusy-11: If you choose to defer the scan, you will be asked to confirm your choice and be reminded of the 30 minutes time window.
Olist-support-43: If you want to see the tracking ID, you can click on the name of the customer. The tracking ID as well as the package ID is displayed.
Olist-customerpickupmissing-26: Now click on the displayed parcel size (e.g. “small size”).
bluetext-8: What if I have expired parcels waiting for the carrier to pick up for several days?
Olist-support-39: Enter your phone number and click on ‘Call me now’.
bluetext-4: What should I do if a customer does not have a pickup notification?
Olist-customerpickupscanissues-24: You can enter the parcel tracking ID manually. Now “Done” appears and you hand all the parcels to the customer.
Olist-support-36: The screen will display helpful advice and explanations on the services.
Olist-support-42: Click on ‘Sync’ to update the status of the current packages.
Olist-driverpickupmissing-32: Select the parcel that is missing below and click on the parcel.
title-4-driverpickupmissing-9: What if the parcel is missing?
Olist-driverdeliveryscanissue-16: Click at the empty line and start to type in the tracking ID. When displayed you can click on it too
title-4-driverdeliveryissues-4: What if I have scan issues?
Olist-support-37: Scroll through the Q&As to learn more
text-support-5: To support the in-store operation of Amazon Hub Counter, Amazon has a Store Support Line to assist you with Application, Device and Delivery issues.
bluetext-3: Do I need to check customer ID?
Olist-customerpickupscanissues-21: Click on “Enter Code” to enter the 6-digit pickup code instead of scanning the barcode.
Olist-driverpickupmissing-31: Tap on the reminder to scan in expired parcels (customer abandoned parcels).
Olist-customerpickupdo-16: Select “Customer pickup” from the home screen.
text-customerpickup-3: An Amazon customer will arrive at the store to pick up or retrieve their parcel(s). The customer will show a notification, which includes 1) a barcode and 2) a 6-digit numeric code. You need to scan the barcode, find for parcel and scan the parcel before handing it to the customer.
Olist-driverpickupmissing-34: Confirm that you cannot find the parcel by clicking on ‘Okay’.
